review: This is really cool.  All the shows I've been missing.  Perfect for when its cold out.

review: great. grandkids can play games and all sorts of movies

review: LOVE the Fire Stick!! Easy to use, good quality picture and can watch Prime, Netflix as well as sever others.

review: I had no idea three weeks usage would up my Verizon bill $800'oo !Plus additional  charge for some programs. dDid not expect that wasn't even hinted at!

review: The fire stick is really fast and works great so far.

review: Love it! easy for me to set up lots of shows I'm happy

review: Purchased Fire Stick about a month ago. Arrived sooner than expected. It was easy to install. Works great. So far no problems!

review: We were very excited to get the fire stick.  We installed it as directed. We were a bit disappointed when it stopped every few minutes to load.  We put the additional attachment on and it has worked great ever since. Very happy with it. Would recommend it for the price.
author: Vicki Noble
